column4: anyone know how to fix this error? FATAL: Error inserting battery (/lib/modules/2.6.24-18-generic/kernel/drivers/acpi/battery.ko): No such device
anyone know how to fix this error? FATAL: Error inserting battery (/lib/modules/2.6.24-18-generic/kernel/drivers/acpi/battery.ko): No such device
anyone know how to stop the acpi or battery module from running ?
i think you would add noacpi to the boot line in grub
